summary: Reduce CI latency by enabling parallel test shard execution
rationale: Queue time dominates cycle time; parallelization reduces lead time while maintaining same coverage

rollback.plan: Revert shard config commit; restore prior runner settings

summary: Enforce strict evidence generation (no mocks) for GA
rationale: Mocked evidence creates false confidence. Failing fast on missing tools is safer for GA.

rollback.trigger: Build failures exceed 50% due to missing tools

summary: Introduce deterministic GMR guardrail metrics and gate scaffolding
rationale: Adds a low-cost drift signal and deterministic evidence gate; minor CI friction is acceptable for GA readiness.

rollback.trigger: Gate false-positive rate >5% daily after baseline warmup
rollback.plan: Disable gmr-gate in CI/preflight and re-tune thresholds
